name: enoki-panel
description: A little javascript static site generator

scripts.start: watchify index.js -o ../bundles/0.1.0/bundle.js -t brfs -t sheetify -p [ css-extract -o ../bundles/0.1.0/bundle.css ] index.js
scripts.build: browserify index.js -o ../bundles/0.1.0/bundle.js -t brfs -t yo-yoify -t [ sheetify -u sheetify-cssnext ] -g es2040 -p [ css-extract -o ../bundles/0.1.0/bundle.css ]

author: Jon-Kyle <contact@jon-kyle.com> (http://jon-kyle.com)
